item.title: White-label API Custom Domain Guide
item.dc:creator: paygate.to
item.description:
In this tutorial you will learn how to use your own custom domain with our payment gateway API. You will be able to use your own domain instead of api.paygate.to and checkout.paygate.to. You will also be able to optionally insert your affiliate wallet to earn 0.5% on every sale your sub-merchant receive. You need to […]
